GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.10
GSD.description:
platform/x86: thinkpad_acpi: Fix a memory leak of EFCH MMIO resource

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 3884bf75fa044c73e843d95dd71a424e80ebb095, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 455cd867b85b53fd3602345f9b8a8facc551adc9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: platform/x86: thinkpad_acpi: Fix a memory leak of EFCH MMIO resource
